mapper.sql: INBOUNDID, NAVICERT, CONTRACTNO, CREATETIME, QTY, SUPPLIER, CONSIGNSOR, INTYPE, REMARKS, STATUS
mapper.select:
select INBOUNDID, NAVICERT, CONTRACTNO, CREATETIME, QTY, SUPPLIER, CONSIGNSOR, INTYPE, REMARKS, STATUS,decode(INTYPE,'10','工业来烟','20','调拨入库','30','退货入库','40','罚没烟') as INTYPENAME, decode(STATUS,'10','新增','20','入库中','30','入库完成','新增') as STATUSNAME from T_WMS_INBOUND where 1=1
AND (CONSIGNSOR like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or NAVICERT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or CONTRACTNO like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
mapper.insert: insert into T_WMS_INBOUND (INBOUNDID, NAVICERT, CONTRACTNO, CREATETIME, QTY, SUPPLIER, CONSIGNSOR, INTYPE, REMARKS, STATUS) values (#{inboundid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{navicert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supplier,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{consignsor,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{intype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into T_WMS_INBOUND
INBOUNDID,
NAVICERT,
CONTRACTNO,
CREATETIME,
QTY,
SUPPLIER,
CONSIGNSOR,
INTYPE,
REMARKS,
STATUS,

sysdate,
#{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{supplier,jdbcType=OTHER},

#{intype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{remarks,jdbcType=OTHER},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update T_WMS_INBOUND
NAVICERT = #{navicert,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACTNO = #{contractno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUPPLIER = #{supplier,jdbcType=OTHER},
CONSIGNSOR = #{consignsor,jdbcType=OTHER},
INTYPE = #{intype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=OTHER},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where INBOUNDID = #{inboundid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_WMS_INBOUND set NAVICERT = #{navicert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACTNO = #{contractno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPPLIER = #{supplier,jdbcType=OTHER}, CONSIGNSOR = #{consignsor,jdbcType=OTHER}, INTYPE = #{intype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=OTHER}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where INBOUNDID = #{inboundid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
